To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RelativeDailyVolume _rdv;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rdv = RDV(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_rdv.IsReady)
{
    var current = _rdv.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rdv = self.RDV(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.rdv.IsReady:
    current = self.rdv.Current.Value
